definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: be quenched, extinguished, go out, of fire or lamp (NH id.; Aram. [[כְּבָא]] id. of light of eyes (rare))—

definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pf. 3 pl. [[כָּבוּ]] Is 43:17; Impf. [[יִכְבֶּה]] 1Sa 3:3, Pr 21:18; 3 fs. [[תִּכְבֶּה]] Le 6:5 + 10 t.; Inf. cstr. [[כְּבוֹתְְ]] Ez Eze 32:7 LXX SyrVer Vulgate Co (MT ´[[כַּבּ]] Pi)—be quenched, extinguished (c. neg. exc. 1Sa 3:3, Pr 26:20, Is 43:17), of lamp ([[נֵר אֱלֽהִים]]) in sanctuary 1Sa 3:3; of altar-fire Le 6:5, Le 6:6; of [[נֵרָהּ]] Pr 31:18; of bodies of renegade Israelites Is 66:24 (cf. [[גֵּיא בֶן־הִנּׁם]]); subj. [[אֵשׁ]] fig. of contention Pr 26:20; fig., subj. fire kindled by ´[[י]] Ez Eze 21:3, Eze 21:4; subj. wrath ([[חֵמָה]]) of ´[[י]] 2Ki 22:17 = 2Ch 34:25, Je 7:20; wrath under fig. of fire ([[אֵשׁ]]) Je 17:27; so of burning land of Edom Is 34:10; of annihilation of Yahweh's enemies Is 43:17 ([[כַּפִּשְׁתָּה]]; ‖[[דָּעַח]]), cf. Pharaoh Ez Eze 32:7 (v. supr.)

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Pf. [[וְכִבּוּ]] consec. 2Sa 14:7; Impf. 3 ms. sf. [[יְכַבֶּנׇּה]] Is 42:3; 2 ms. [[תְּכַבֶּה]] 2Sa 21:17; [[וַיְכַבּוּ]] 2Ch 29:7; Inf. [[כַּבּוֹת]] Ct So 8:7; also MT [[כַּבּוֹתְְ]] Ez Eze 32:7 (but cf. supr.); Pt. [[מְכַבֶּה]] Is 1:31 + 3 t.;—quench, extinguish, fig. except 2Ch 29:7 (of extinguishing lamps, [[נֵרוֹת]], in temple); sq. [[נֵר יִשְׂרָאֵל]] (fig. for life of David) 2Sa 21:17; sq. [[גַּחַלְתִּי]] (coal = family-hope) 2Sa 14:7 (of killing widow's only son); sq. [[פִּשְׁתָּה כֵהָה]] Is 42:3 dimly-burning wick (fig. of spiritually weak); implied obj. ref. to wrath of ´[[י]] Am 5:6, Je 4:4, Je 21:12; to people and idols Is 1:31; sq. love [[אַהֲבָה]] Ct So 8:7 (subj. [[מַיִם רַבִּים]]); Ez Eze 32:7 cf. supr.
